column5: Will be fishing at Ghost River in 2 weeks and looking for recent info on water levels, whether you can get into Clamshell via tunnel, general fishing info etc. Thanks in advance.wmd
I was there July 13-20 and the tunnel was open to Clamshell.I don't know if they got more rain since then.Maddogg

Thanks Maddog, anyone else been at Ghost River lately, leaving in 9 days. Sad when a pizza post gets pages of responses and a fishinjg response gets 1. I know there are more people fishing Ghost River than this.wmd

I have Ghost River on my list to fish one of these days! I cant say why more folks posted on the pizza thread than on the Ghost River thread. I have a buddy that has fished LacSeul and the Ghost, he won't go anywhere but the Ghost! Good luck and let us know how the trip went!
I leave tomorrow for Ghost River, hopefully i will have some info for you when i return...
Hi Huck, Have a great trip Thank you,Larry Mac
Hi Huck. I will be going when you are coming out, so should see you at the landing. Look forward to meeting you there.wmd
